title: Suddenly getting insane lag
body: I have a decent computer, usually I can run medium-high settings at 60 fps, but today I come on and i cant run very low settings with more than 12 fps. Idk wtf happened, but League is literally unplayable for me rn.

replies.body: Are you on a laptop, and is it plugged to a power source?  Otherwise, you might be having some outdated drivers or game files that can cause wear and tear to your frames.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
